title: Climate Apocalypse Now, Killer Skittles? 07.21.22
itunes:title: Climate Apocalypse Now, Killer Skittles? 07.21.22
description:
In episode 1292, Jack and Miles are joined by activist, comedian, and co-host of #GoodMuslimBadMuslim, Zahra Noorbakhsh, to discuss... European Heat Wave: The Predictions Are Becoming Reality a Lot Sooner, So … Are Skittles Poison Now? And more!

  1. European Heat Wave: The predictions are becoming reality a lot sooner
  2. So … Are Skittles Poison Now?
  3. Dunkin’ Donuts ditches titanium dioxide – but is it actually harmful?

  4. The Strange Connection Between Ranch Dressing And Sunscreen

  5. Nano-sized additives found in many foods, cosmetics
  6. Food additive or carcinogen? The growing list of chemicals banned by EU but used in US

LISTEN: Devil by Alx Beats

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
